title: Coat
description: plain white skirt beneath shoulder flaps of white fabric with red and dark blue embroidery with heavy yarn; long sleeves under shoulder flaps also embroidered in heavy yarn (blue, brown and red); center of chest decorated with ribbons forming top half of a rectangle, short gold tassels and long multicolored tassels
creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund and Gift of funds from Thirza Cleveland and Joan Wurtele
